name: rinuts
desc:
An HTTP server which exposes unit tests via REST API.
Rinuts is extensible via 'rinuts-drivers'. Currently, we maintain:
  • A nodeunit driver
  • An mstest (!!) driver for Windows
usage: Each app that runs on anode may choose to expose black box tests using rinuts (or rinuts-compatible HTTP API). This allows us to automatically run app tests against any version of the code when we integrate code into master or during development.
